short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic solver for LinkedIn's Queens Game puzzles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Chrome Web Store Listing

## Description
Queens Game Solver helps you solve LinkedIn's N-Queens puzzle variations. It automatically finds valid solutions while respecting both standard chess queen movement rules and LinkedIn's special color constraints.

### Features
- Automatically detects LinkedIn's Queens Game puzzles
- Solves puzzles of any size
- Respects color constraints and pre-placed queens
- Step-by-step solution visualization
- Clean, intuitive interface

### Instructions
1. Navigate to a LinkedIn Queens Game puzzle
2. Click the extension icon
3. Press "Solve Puzzle" to see the solution
4. Watch as moves are automatically applied

### Privacy Policy
This extension:
- Only activates on LinkedIn.com
- Does not collect any personal data
- Does not track user behavior
- Does not modify any LinkedIn content except puzzle interactions
- Requires minimal permissions (activeTab, storage) for core functionality

### Support
For issues or feedback, please visit our GitHub repository or contact support at [your-email]

### Version History
1.0.0 - Initial release
- Basic puzzle detection and solving
- Support for all puzzle sizes
- Automated move application
